website_summaries.verdict: While the MEElectronics Sport-Fi S6 Earphones are affordable and decent-sounding, with a nice set of accessories, they won't fit everyone equally well.
pros: The MEElectronics Sport-Fi S6 Earphones deliver good sound for the money if you can get a tight seal
The earphones come with a nice set of accessories, including an extension cord and a nice carrying case
cons: Some people may have a hard time getting a comfortable fit and a tight seal, the lack of which hurts sound quality
There's no built-in microphone/remote for making calls

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and isolate noise well
customer_reviews.text: I needed new headphones because my other ones broke, i guess it was just their time to croak. i got these new ones for work and for runs, but now for my girlfriend i'm not any fun, because now i can't hear her when my playlist's begun when we're running together outside in the sun. so i act like it's paused during a song that i like, or whenever the mood seems to strike, and i see her mouth moving, i nod and pretend then finally pause when the songs at an end. so buyers with ladies, beware! these work pretty well, so remember to at least act like you care.
customer_reviews.author: CatLoversUnite

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these headphones twice and will purchase a third time. They hold up very well to intense workouts where they are snatched out of my ears. These things have held up to being stepped on, slammed to the ground, bounced off walls and full on down pours. The sound is okay but I don't need perfect sound when I'm working out. The most important function these headphones offer is the around the ear hook. They reduce so much frustration on those sweaty runs by not slipping out of my ears. And, for the price you can't beat it. I'm getting about 2 years' use out of a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Window shopper 3000

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to all!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I am a farmer and run a tractor about 10 hours a day and this set is amazing. I don't like things in my ears, and I don't even feel these at the end of the day! They are very comfortable, block out most of the surrounding noise (from the tractor motor and other equipment) yet still have excellent sound quality! I would recommend these to anyone and everyone that I come across!
customer_reviews.author: Bomber

customer_reviews.title: the armband that comes with it is next to useless. As for the headphones themselves
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of earbuds for when I run. First of all, the armband that comes with it is next to useless. As for the headphones themselves, they work and that's about all I can positively say about them. They're inconvenient to place in my ears when compared to all other headphones I've used (including other MEElectronics pairs). The volume control is completely unnecessary. It just confuses me (do I adjust the volume on the slider or my phone?). I moved to a pair of Bluetooth headphones and never looked back.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Isola

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for Runners
customer_reviews.text: MEElectronics makes great in-ear headphone. I have 3 different types; love them all. This one is a must if you’re a runner and have trouble fitting with other brands. I’d tried so many; they either constant fall out or sound cuts in and out. This one design to hold headphone right in place, sweat proof. Love the memory wire design. A not easy to find in-ear canal ear-tips; this one fits me well. Love all the useful accessories: Extension cable, armband, carrying case. This one is money well spend.
customer_reviews.author: Chaser

customer_reviews.title: These are the best for runners
customer_reviews.text: This is tough for me out of many types. I'll keep it short. These are the best for runners. Short cord length, loud sound, good bass, good ear fit. All the stuff I want in headphones. It is sweat/waterproof but not super durable. I run half marathons and I have to replace them about once a year. The volume control has fallen off and the other one won't change songs. I've tried other ones but just love these. So buy them but have a back up. All things considered, they last about 300 miles in running so that's not that terrible. Worth the $30
customer_reviews.author: duderino

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed in these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in these headphones. I purchased them once, and was very pleased with sound, but they broke (one side of the earbuds stopped working). They worked for about a month or two. They aren't super expensive, and I thought it was a one off situation due to the work I put them through running. I purchased them again with even worse results (and same problem in less than five runs). Buyers beware, these work great at first but don't hold up under use. Not a fan of headphones with the "sport" title that aren't durable enough to be used in active life.
customer_reviews.author: Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but they work...
customer_reviews.text: Not the best, but they get the job done. Things I don't like: - The cable is SO short that you have to use the extension that comes with it. This is really annoying and pointless. - The extension is so hard to plug in to the earbud's cable that at first I thought it didn't work and was about to return them (just push really hard and they will connect!!!! don't despair) - They don't sound as good as other headphones for a similar price... So yeah, I wouldn't recommend them BUT they aren't bad.
customer_reviews.author: Aorata

customer_reviews.title: If only the quality was better
customer_reviews.text: I love the design, fit and function of these headphones. They are hands-down the best I've found for workouts and running. That's the good news. The first set worked perfect for about ten days before the right-side ear piece started cutting in and out. I was able to determine the weakness was in the cord below the volume/mic component. I called Amazon Tech support and they gladly sent out a replacement set. Well, that arrived yesterday. This morning I opened it and discovered the right ear piece doesn't work at all on the replacement set. I called Amazon again and they are sending out a third set. Hopefully this one works. If not, I'll be changing my stars to 1.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: UNDERWHELMED
customer_reviews.text: Meh. I don't hear any improvement In sound quality over standard apple ear buds. Plus it has a fussy 2 piece cord that I can't for the life of me understand why they did that. Also "L" shaped connector makes them not work with a lot of cases and most battery cases. Volume slider is awful compared to + - buttons. Wrap around ear format makes getting them on more trouble than needs to be. Once in they are comfortable enough. I purchased these as a lightening deal that showed regular price of $60. These deals are BS. I GOT THEM FOR $22 and they are now on Amazon for $24. Shame on me.
customer_reviews.author: jn

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but flimsy wire
customer_reviews.text: These earphones fit me very well and I like the sound quality. However, durability is a problem. The cable is very thin and it doesn't take a whole lot to break it. Mine have started to break just above the plug and I've been using them weekly since July 2014. The connection is intermittent - one channel comes and goes - but it's only a matter of time until it snaps. The earlier models also had the same problem. If you can come up with a way to reinforce the wire just above the plug (maybe a piece of heat-shrink tubing) then these should last you quite a bit longer
customer_reviews.author: Blue Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good for Running, Biking, and Home Projects
customer_reviews.text: I like to listen to books, but often need to turn them off quickly when someone says something to me. This unit has an on/off button and volume slider. I especially like that pushing the ON button will restart a book in the correct place without me even having to touch my phone, and even if I the book wasn't the last app that I used. The sound is good and the earphones fit well. My only niggling complaint is that the moldable cord doesn't stay perfectly tight. It does stay tight enough to keep them from falling out when running though. I own over a dozen pair of earphones, and these are my new favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey G. Boldt

customer_reviews.title: A Dream!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at how wonderful this set was. I have never had such wonderful earphones... let alone ones that I can run without worrying about them popping out. You can't hear anything except the music. The remote on it is also wonderful. You can turn the volume up and down. You can pause and play the music. And if you click the play button twice it goes to the next song. I was also happy that it came with other sizes to put on the ends because I have tiny ears. Truly wonderful! I recommend it to anyone. It worked perfectly running 5-6 MPH.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Decent Sounds Less than Decent Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: Decent headphones but nothing spectacular. The quality is somewhat poor - for example, one of the ear pieces came out in my ear as I was pulling them out and head to use tweezers to remove them. Also have had to tape them in a couple of spots where the wiring is showing thru the sheath. Best part about the purchase was the case it came in... I've used it for holding a number of different things in my bag now that the earphones have all but fallen apart.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Lee

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret these!
customer_reviews.text: These lasted me about 3 years of pretty rough usage. They also survived 2 accidental washing machine cycles in different occasions. Sound quality is very very good, considering the price. Control is easy to use, typical 3 button control. They stay in place when running even if you sweat a lot. Never had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: J. Torrens

customer_reviews.title: BAD !!! Do Not Buy !!!! - Control and connection issues
customer_reviews.text: The troubles started within 2 months. Now at end of 4 months its almost junk The control seems to work intermittently . Sometimes it works sometimes it does not. When it does not I cannot skip songs, pause songs or stop for an incoming call. Also the mic stops working. The person calling cannot hear me. I have double checked each time if the cables are connected properly with the phone and the extension cable. There seems to be no issue with it Sometime the sound stops for small movements of cable when I am walking.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Decent but you get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.text: These are decent but not great. Sound is okay but the wire that's supposed to bend around your ear to keep it in place is surprisingly flimsy, meaning it has to be bent to keep it in place. So the ear buds will start to pop out, which means you have to readjust them in stride. Hardly ideal. Also the volume slider control is very hard to finesse, you'll find yourself sliding it up and back several times to hit the right volume. Maybe I should have spent the $100 for the Bose... If you lose your headphones a lot, maybe this is the right headphone for you.
customer_reviews.author: DLosangeles

customer_reviews.title: Great set of earphones for running.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great set of headphones. They fit comfortably and only occasionally fall out of my ears. I really like the inline controls and the modular cable. Thats great for when I use the armband. The armband is a little big but it fits my Galaxy S4 perfectly. The only CON that I have is that the left earbud no longer works. It seems to have shorted out after a few months. But right side is still going strong so I'm making due with that. But I would recommend this and would get these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good set of sports earbuds
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are perfect if you are doing a lot of movement and your current earbuds fall out often. They will stay in your ears and the multiple size buds allows for every ear shape to be covered. However, if these are left in for long periods of time (2+ hours) they will start to hurt your ears and are uncomfortable. Under two hours, they are perfect with no strain on the ears. The independent volume, mic, and play/pause button is a great bonus.
customer_reviews.author: PMass

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones , good product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love these heahones! I have had these headphones almost for a year now. I had an issue with a wire on the left headphone piece and I reached out to the company and received a new pair with no hassle!!!! The company asked me to send them the headphones and they would either replace or fix the headphones for me. This process took a week and I had my new headphones. I can't rave enough how I love the quality of these headphones and great customer service I received.I would definitely purchase this head set again.
customer_reviews.author: cita581

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality headphones.  Stay away.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality headphones. I bought these 12-months ago. Used them on my iphone 5c, while exercising at the gym. Nothing too crazy - elliptical, treadmill, weights. After 4 months, one side of the phones died. A symptom was intermittent static that was audible when the volume slide was moved / shifted. I put them away and used the 5c earbuds, which lasted until yesterday, at which point they dies also. I took the Sport-Fi's out today just to double-check them. Yep - they're dead still. Stay away. No quality here.
customer_reviews.author: Foofoodust

customer_reviews.title: Very inexpensive but high-quality earphones
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the 1) number of extras included; and 2) quality of the earphones. The set includes several different types and sizes of silicone inserts so that a user can maximize their comfort. Additionally, the earphones themselves provide nice, clear sound and decent noise-isolation, all considering the low price, of course. Although other more expensive earphones may offer marginally better isolation and/or sound, this set, I believe, offers a great balance of price/quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but they work.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 8 months. The Volume slider was always scratching and would cut out while adjusting. Fit great and stayed in my ears well. Which is hard for me to find headphones that fit both my ears without falling out of one or the other. Just after the warranty ran out the wire connecting into the right headphone broke it's restraint and I super glued it to hold. Still works and I still use them occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Humhead74

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to begin my exercise routines and so far they have been sturdy and do what they promise
customer_reviews.text: MEElectronics you did it again! i have had prevous headphones from this company and they have lasted me a while. I bought this to begin my exercise routines and so far they have been sturdy and do what they promise. you cannot beat the price and bundle, and sound quality. The sound is really clear, but does lack some bass. The multiple buds they give feel confortable and suitable for any ear. The option to also extend or shorten your cable lenght and the in line mic sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: droidgeek

customer_reviews.title: Lasted just a few weeks - but good cust service
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks of occasional use there is a short somewhere near the headphone jack. The earphones and microphone cut out for minutes at a time, making them useless. 30 day Amazon warranty had passed, so this purchase was a COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY. Bottom line, the absurdly short warranty makes these headphones a BAD RISK to buy. UPDATE: Moved up to 3 stars for excellent customer service, and after two tries I now have a working set. I likely WOULD buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Book fan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value and Good Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised by the sound quality of these headphones. As an audiophile, I am quite picky about my headphones, and I have gone through many pairs of budget and higher quality headphones in the past few years. When I first got these headphones, the sound was not good, but after experimenting with various sizes of plugs (included), I found a better fit and the sound quality got much better. A reasonably balanced and clear sound with no harshness in the treble. Bass is adequate but not exaggerated.
customer_reviews.author: F Sabella

customer_reviews.title: I like the in-line volume control
customer_reviews.text: I use these for mowing the lawn. As with any in-ear set I have had, they occasionally come out do to a cord tug or sweat. The over-ear loop helps this. I like the in-line volume control. I don't really need the adjustable cord length (~12" spacer). I use the full length to reach my pants pocket with the right amount of slack. I didn't notice this detail before I bought them and opened them. Nice to know I have this adjustment in the future though.
customer_reviews.author: John Berry

customer_reviews.title: Sound isn't worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The design is pretty cool, but the sound of these earbuds suck. The bass isn't nearly as good as people claim it is on here and the highs aren't any good either. Also, in my experiece, the earbuds have to be in just right to have optimum sound. For me, this means they can't be securely in and I've tried using all the ear sizes that came with the packaging. I could of had a much better music listening experience getting some Skull Candys or any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: The memory wire wasn't the best idea. Its so pliable its not really an ...
customer_reviews.text: The memory wire wasn't the best idea. Its so pliable its not really an accurate stay and too easy to take other forms, the right ear never stayed in, and the plastid casing to the volume up/down music stop/go broke off and the headphones stopped working. The only reason this gets 3 stars is because of its durability, ive had this for a while before the plastic casing broke off, but the memory wire is the worst idea.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sperling

customer_reviews.title: Bose quality for a lot lot less.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Mee electronic head set and ear buds since they first came out. They ate the best with high quality sound and affordable prices. It's too bad they don't sell them in stores around here. I will definitely buy them again. I am still using these when I am driving and need.to conference with someone on the phone. It is better to be hands free with this than the Bluetooth that I can never get to work.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Volt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought similar models of this headphones but this ones are deffinetely the best. The noise cancelling is amazing, I can wear them in the gym and even without playing music, I don't hear all the noise in the gym. Once you play music you almost can't hear anything else (I use a low volume). The volume control is pretty and works also with Windows Phone!. The only cons that I found but I consider that it is something that does not affect everybody, is that the arm band is to small for my cellphone, the size is for an iPhone. Also, for doing bench press you need to be carefull to don't hit the volume control.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I have a very hard time finding ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have a very hard time finding earbuds for exercising that stay in and are comfortable, and these do the trick. At first I was worried about the over-ear wires staying firm, and not becoming too flexible over time, but its lasted really well. We now own two pairs of these Pros: Fit well. Long cord volume control on the coard. Cons: Get tangled easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mooshwa

customer_reviews.title: Good everything except build quality.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: They wrap well and stay in place. They sound pretty good but I use foam tip inserts which make most earbuds sound great. I like that the wire is detachable. Cons: Build quality. I had issues with the extension wire coming apart within a couple months. Then I got another extension off amazon and within a couple months the short male jack started failing as well. Total of 7 months I had these. Admittedly I use them 5+ times a week to play basketball and do cycling so that may not be a reasonable life span.
customer_reviews.author: Cneu

customer_reviews.title: Horribly hard to get set correctly in your ears
customer_reviews.text: Horribly hard to get set correctly in your ears, and when they are correctly positioned, the outside noise is ridiculous. Had to turn the volume up on the iPod to almost full just to be able to hear the music over the external noise in the gym. Horrible product. Incredibly over priced. The $12 headphones I bought at WalMart work 10x better than these. Even if they only last half as long, I'm still ahead of the game. Save your money and look elsewhere for headphones.
customer_reviews.author: George GeRue

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine... until they didn't
customer_reviews.text: While they worked decently for the first couple months, the sound was not as rich as my Sony headphones which cost half the price. The buds also fell out pretty easily once I started getting sweaty. This was all ok since these were meant for the gym, but then the right speaker started cutting in and out and finally went totally dead a couple weeks ago. They were not worth the $30 I spent on them.
customer_reviews.author: DC_Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not for my ears
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good, they stay in place for sports, mic quality is good. Unfortunately, regardless of which tips I use, I can't wear these earphones for more than an hour as they end up hurting my ear canals. I've tried all the tips and have not been able to find any that make these comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: My favorite head phones
customer_reviews.text: My favorite head phones. Had to re-buy because i lost my other ones. Great sound quality and the fact they stay secure on my ears when I am working out which is my primary reason for using.
customer_reviews.author: B. Perry

customer_reviews.title: different sound than the M6P
customer_reviews.text: These have a different sound than the M6P. These seem to have a lot more treble and less bass for me. The cable is really short and only meant to be used with an armband. You cannot have them on and put your phone / device in your pocket. My set also arrived with a non working mic / remote. This isn't a big deal since I would only use it for running but it would be nice to be able to activate siri or switch tracks. My opinion would be to just go with the more versatile M6P over this model.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Tong

customer_reviews.title: I had the hardest time finding a good set of in ear earphones
customer_reviews.text: I had the hardest time finding a good set of in ear earphones. Until these!!! I use them when riding motorcycle and they are great. Definitely noise isolating! Over the ear wire is comfortable and bends to fit any ear. Multiple size earpieces to make sure comfy fit. easy to use volume control and button to answer phone calls. Microphone picks up and has never been an issue when talking with some one. The cord is two pieces the make the ear buds even more versatile. the extension cord allows the ear phones to go from fitness length to leaving phone or music source in pocket. Also comes with a case, a bit large, but keeps everything together.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Owen

customer_reviews.title: Not a good long term choice
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use while at the gym and read 5 star reviews by others who praised their water resistance and secure placement while working out. These features seem to work well. The base response seems muted compared to other earbud style headphones and the control did not work properly, seemed poorly placed and was in the way during workouts. The control finally came apart several months after I purchased them. Needless to say I am not pleased and will not order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Microphone works poorly
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of M6P MEElectronics In-Ear headphones that I loved. When I saw this product on sale for <$30, I jumped at the opportunity and ordered. Unfortunately, the microphone barely works, no one can hear me or understand me. Any contact with the chord during a phone call causes major interference. They're still fine for listening, but the microphone is absolutely horrendous. The included arm-band and case are REALLY nice, though.
customer_reviews.author: that guy

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by the quality and in particular, the sound quality of these headphones. Most cheap headphones sound like a tin can and string. These don't. The package deal is also nice. You get the headphones (stubby cord), extension cord, several different types of ear canal inserts, and the armband for exercise. I use an iPhone 5 with mine and it works great. I would consider this a good deal. 4 stars because it's difficult to get the smartphone out of case.
customer_reviews.author: John Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Try something else
customer_reviews.text: These were horrible. Terrible fit, gave up on them after a week or two.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good when it worked
customer_reviews.text: The headphone were good for about a month...When they were working, they were great. Now they are crackly and intermittently work. Not sure if I just got a bad one. I like the storage it came with. Use it to store my other music stuff. Also like the pouch. Wouldn't mind a replacement to give this another shot. Unfortunately I dont know if what I have can be repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: it's a nice product that serves it's purpose but it's not great att all
customer_reviews.text: **updated after 4 months** overall i think it serves it's purpose. i bought it because it is the only quality earphones i found for android. pros: lightweight i really loved the arm band (even though its kinda heavy) cons: not comfortable - the memory wire is bad the sound is mediocre the volume and bass aren't as good either the volume control isn't sensitive at all which makes the adjustment of the volume hard, i would have liked buttons instead feels cheap
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but far from perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are best used while running with the arm on and the short wire. They become more cumbersome outside of the armband and with the longer wire extension. And they aren't quite "memory" for me, I find myself adjusting them while working out more than I'd like to, even with the armband. The sound and microphone are great though, no complaints there.
customer_reviews.author: amytee

customer_reviews.title: The best design for athletic earphones - they never fall out!
customer_reviews.text: These earbud headphones come in a nice package with a few thoughtful accessories. 2 clothing clips for keeping the cord from bouncing all over the place, a storage case and a variety of ear bud types to fit all ear canal types. The ribbed cone shape ones fit better than any other bud I've tried before. The arm band only fits a small iPhone like the 5 and older, my galaxy s5 doesn't. I keep the buds partially out of my ear sometimes to hear the ambient sounds, and the physical volume slider control is superb -guaranteed to work with any device.
customer_reviews.author: A. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty damn durable for their price, nice sound quality, and very very good for canceling out outside noise. Update: I've had these for a little over 2 years now. The flexible wire that allows them to adjust around your ears has broken, and rubbed against the wires that allow sound to travel to the ear buds, and they are now broken.
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: they don't feel as comfortable as I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I give it a 3 for early arrival and for the put away case it comes with. However, the cable is too short, hence, I'm obligated to use the extension cable it comes with, which then makes the cable too long, specially to go running. Also, they don't feel as comfortable as I was expecting. As far as sound, they are ok. I will keep them as my back up headphones
customer_reviews.author: jorge

customer_reviews.title: 1st Day Review
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as I was looking for something I could use walking/jogging. These so far fit the bill. They seem to stay in and block a lot of the outside noise (good for treadmill/bad for running on street). There are plenty of different types and sizes of tips to fit almost anyone. My iphone 5s with slim case (belkin candy grip) with no problem. The armband also fits what seems to be a wide array of arm sizes. The headphones also come with a nice semi-hard case. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Jayz1013

customer_reviews.title: Cool, Headphone System for Working out
customer_reviews.text: It's a great item. the color and design of the item is so, good for the purpose, of using in a good workout. It was well package and the directions were very clear, I was expecting a one case, for the mobile phone. I do use the earphone case, as well too store my Samsung galaxy s4, and that's so smooth to me. The arm band, works good, the micr works very good,
customer_reviews.author: Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Awful quality all around
customer_reviews.text: These were such a waste of money. The wires are cheap and their connection has slowly gotten looser and looser so that after only a couple weeks I constantly have to adjust the chord for all the sound to come through. Also the chord is too short to reach my pocket when I don't want or need to carry it in the armband. There's an extension chord but using it makes the sound 10x worse. These are garbage, don't waste your money unless you want a $60 iPhone armband. UPDATE: Customer service was helpful and sent me a replacement pair, so I'm updating to a neutral 3 stars pending their performance after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, great for workouts...but poor durability :(
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this product, I loved it. They were perfect for working out and had great sound. The problem arises with the durability of the product. Less than a year later, the memory wire plastic guide tube has detached from the earbud, exposing the metal wire which allows for "memory". The wire is pretty sharp - somewhat unnerving to have it right next to my head. Additionally, one of the plastic clips for attaching the wires to clothing cracked and is now unusable. I take really good care of all of my electronics products, so it's pretty disappointing to have them fall apart on me - especially one of the key features for why I bought these earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: KNova

customer_reviews.title: Good thing their cheap because they don't last.
customer_reviews.text: Good thing their cheap because they don't last. First two pairs of these that I had the cord shorted out within a month. The third pair has lasted a little longer however this pair the right headphone has gone out. Not sure if it the cord again or due to sweat but in either case, these headphones are just not very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Coedy

customer_reviews.title: The best 3 weeks I've had with a product
customer_reviews.text: When I first got these, I thought I was getting a great deal on great sound, great accessories that's perfect for the way I listen to music, all of which was true! For 3 weeks! Then, for some reason, my headphones decided they didn't want to play the full sound anyone, and instead became incredibly tinny, only working somewhere near what it used to when I plug it in most of the way, but not all the way. Incredibly disappointing thing for an otherwise great product. Yes, life happens, and it was a great deal, but it should still be able to hold up to the wear and tear of life for more than 3 WEEKS. Such a let down
customer_reviews.author: Roy Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Good while they worked
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set of headphones 3 months ago they were great until just recently. The headphones sound great and create a really nice seal that blocks out a lot of outside noise. This set comes with plenty of accessories for the price. However after only 3 months of normal use the pause/play button activates itself randomly while I'm using them, this is very annoying and makes the headphones unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing Defect need to perform quality check before you dispatch
customer_reviews.text: The product looked fantastic before i unpacked it but once after i opened and tried the headphones i noticed that left ear piece was damaged i.e. broken!! Next the so called modular cable was again a fail as it did not work properly when i used my other ear buds to check it out, I was able to ear sound on one side not the both . Only thing which was good in the whole package was the "ArmBand" . Good that amazon refunded when i reported this issue to them. At least for the sake of amazon, MEElectronics should consider providing a better quality products.
customer_reviews.author: shashi kiran

customer_reviews.title: When more power was put through it though when I connected it to some other speakers it was just fine, but on my phone
customer_reviews.text: The sounds seems too low compared to the other headphones I use. I can be in a quiet setting and everything on max, with the volume control on the headphones up, and still have trouble on what someone is saying in a movie. When more power was put through it though when I connected it to some other speakers it was just fine, but on my phone, ipod, and laptop it seemed rather low. The armband seemed nice, but I never use it. The extension for when you are not using the headband also comes in handy a lot. The quality is good though, even though the sound seems low.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: WOW! What a great product. I never had headphones that lock onto your ears the way these do, and they are snug inside too. You get a nice carrying case, extra cord to make it longer if needed, extra ear buds to make sure the fit it great, like 6 extra pairs. The sound is wonderful, nice level of bass. Sounds great with Pearl Jam LOL
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Coffin

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality was good. Unfortunately my replacements have finally died
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these just over one year ago. The first pair I received lasted one work out but was quickly replaced under warranty with no issues. Sound quality was good. Unfortunately my replacements have finally died. 1 year and 1 month later with light use of 1-3 workouts per week. The volume would go to near zero until i played with the volume slider. Looks like i will need another set. I wonder if these can be found without the mic, volume control and extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M Hrab

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item to support running outside near roads with some moderate vehicle noise. These fit great in my ear, don't slip out, sound great, and reduce outside noise. It also comes with extra sizes of the rubber inserts in case your ear is smaller/larger. I like how the cord is shorter so it doesn't have as much excess when using an armband (does come with an extender if you want it to be standard length). It does come with an armband, but I simply prefer to use my older one. But at least I have another if I ever need it.
customer_reviews.author: ddog

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty happy with these headphone. Mainly they do a good job of staying in my ear. The sound quality is pretty good, my old ones sounded better but they cost 3 times as much so for the money I thought they were a great deal. My phone call tester said I sounded fine on the phone so one more decent feature would put this in the 4.5 star category if Amazon had it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved the first pair which lasted me 4 years or ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of MEE headphones I've owned. I loved the first pair which lasted me 4 years or so. This pair is better with the inline mic (which I haven't used yet). I primarily use this for the gym and the sound quality (to my non-audiophile ear) is superb. I got the green with the case for my iphone though so far I'm only using the headphones with an old nano. The cord is smaller than on my past set (with an extension option which is too long for the gym) but works for me. I'm approximately 6' and 185 pounds. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Wiggling

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my brother for Christmas since he recently lost 100 lbs and is doing his damndest to get fit for the first time in his life. He has really small ear canal openings so normal earbuds won't stick in his ears while he runs and the wraparound ones are apparently either very uncomfortable or the sound quality sucks. He loves this set, they fit perfectly and with the smart wire can stay on his ear without falling off even while he runs or jogs or lifts, the added bonus of the armband was also great as he didn't have to get one and had the whole package from the get go.
customer_reviews.author: John Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I have read other reviews about how these are hard or a pain to fit around the ears. I don't have a problem they work wonderfully and I enjoy the extra length of cord with them it always me to wear the arm band in different locations. I will add more if I have any problems but I have done many things with these so far from exercising to owing the lawn still work great
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for the right earphones to use with my Kindle HDX 7" and this was the product for me. I took a chance as I have hearing deficits in both ears and wanted something noise cancelling. The earbuds I was using were hurting and I really could not hear clearly with them. These are wonderful. You get so many different caps to try so you get the right fit. I am very happy with this product and would recommend them to anyone looking for a good fit and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: cupcake57

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound, noise canceling, and low profile!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones! I bought these to fit under my motorcycle helmet without ripping my ears every time I put it on or take it off. These fit flush and solve that problem for me. What suprised me was the sound quality and the noise canceling. Now these are not Boss headphones, but for the price they sound better then my more expensive Skull Candy's. And wearing these kills normal conversation level noise completely. I can still hear my motorcycle (it's pretty loud) but that's a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service to deal with and they don't back ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible customer service to deal with and they don't back their product. The sound was OK coming out of the earbuds but the mic wouldn't pick up my voice I had to hold it up to my face. Finally after owning them for less then 14 days they broke and I had to fight tooth and nail to get any form of customer service and even then they made me feel like I was getting a favor done.
customer_reviews.author: Phome

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product, sounds good. Just too many connections make it difficult to keep together.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Good earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: Although I did not keep them (I decided I wanted more ear coverage than earbuds, and ended up getting a pair of Bluetooth headphones that go around the back of the head), I thought these were very nice earbuds; they fit well, the sound quality was very good and they came with a nice little carrying case. So all in all, I would definitely recommend them, and delivery was very fast!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for riding
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear while riding my motorcycle and they isolate the wind noise perfectly. With other earphones I would have to turn the music up really load to hear it but not with these. The volume can stay low and you can still hear it. The volume slider on the cord is perfect and easy to operate, even when wearing gloves.
customer_reviews.author: S Triplett

customer_reviews.title: Great ear buds
customer_reviews.text: I go through these things like ripe fruit but these seem a bit more stout. The sound is quite good for buds and they come with more attachments than an adult toy; one is sure to fit your ears. The only drawback is one shared by all such products and that is the tendency to become instantly tangled the moment you put them down. I swear my kids are hiding kittens just to set them on my ear buds the moment I turn away. We'll see how long they last but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ola Ranchero

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great. For maybe two months
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great. For maybe two months. I've had two pairs of these, and I like the controls on the headphones and the sound, but for the price, I would expect them to last longer than a couple of months. I was hoping the first set was just a fluke, but the second set started cutting out even more quickly. Funny thing is, I saw some complaints about these and saw that the customers were told to email customer service, so after my first pair gave out, I sent an email to that same address that those people were recommended to use, and I never received a reply. Apparently, they only care if you are publicly complaining.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ward

customer_reviews.title: best headphones I have had
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds stay really flush in the ear and no issues at all with them coming out of the ears. Much better than any long strings or the behind ear ones I have had. They simply fit perfect while working out. The length of the cord is perfect for use with arm band and additional attachment works great if want to listen to television while on aerobic equipment. Sounds as good as the 2 other $40-$50 ones I have owned. Don't post many reviews but this product was so good I decided to post it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMom

customer_reviews.title: but for me to hear my music I had to turn the volume up all the way because the sound quality was either terrible or had an issu
customer_reviews.text: Right when I plugged the headphones into the extended AUX cord the sound from the headphone only came out of one ear and had a very static sound to it. I tried it out while working out and the sound finally adjusted, but for me to hear my music I had to turn the volume up all the way because the sound quality was either terrible or had an issue with the cord connection. The only good thing about this product is how it fits into you ear. Its the only headphones that actually stay on while I am sweating and running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones! The sound is great. The color is great. Definitely recommend - especially at this price! Came with all the accessories stated. Only thing - have to be gentle with the headphones. The portion that wraps around your ear can become torn if pulled on too much (since they hook onto things - and itself - easily).
customer_reviews.author: Thao

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't what my dad had expected at all, it always came out of his ear, and the sound quality isn't good at all, were sticking to bose
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a pair of sports headphones with an in-line volume control, since I'm tired of my iPhone's earbuds getting yanked out when I run. I wasn't expecting fabulous sound quality for the price, but I was hoping it would at least match the sound quality of my current earbuds. Nope, they sound tinny and terrible. I spent 20 minutes trying to use my phone's equalizer to find some level of bass on my workout songs. Waste of time. I gave them two stars, since the armband is okay and the ear wires were easy to adjust. They also fit quite well and don't come out of my ears. Too bad they sound so horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Biku2020

customer_reviews.title: not bad...
customer_reviews.text: From a sound perspective, practically no bass at all - but decent at the high end. Microphone works well - not too much noise even when it's windy. Button works fine to answer the phone or skip to the next song. First set of rubber plugs worked fine for about two weeks - then one kept sticking in my ear. Overall a decent mid-range phone...
customer_reviews.author: R. Baer

customer_reviews.title: The best headphones for exercise
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly as advertised. After getting tired of constantly having to reposition my headphones at the gym, I got these and they definitely stick with you through a workout. Never move at all and the sound is surprising good. I can't wait to try them on the bicycle when the weather gets warmer. I wasn't disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: VitaminMoose

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given these a higher rating but it bothers me that the wiring doesn't actually hold them in place. The sound is really good and they do technically stay in place. Although I'm not pushing them back in my ear like my past headphones, these I have to keep correcting the wiring. Sometimes it's a slight struggle to put the headphones on too.
customer_reviews.author: Shobitha Shaji

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I had bought the Sport-Fi M6 for when I garden and I like them a lot. But I wanted a pair I could use with my PC and they had to have a microphone. These were more expensive then the M6 and while the sound is as good, the cord on these is very thin and I doubt it will hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: KSF

customer_reviews.title: I ended up getting the powerbeats which also hook over your ear like these, which is a feature I love as ...
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning these. They're decent headphones, but not worth the price. I ended up getting the powerbeats which also hook over your ear like these, which is a feature I love as they don't fall out while you're working out. Good sound, and the hooks over the ears can be adjusted and bent to fit better around your ear.
customer_reviews.author: T Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Broke after approx 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. I've dabbled with the cheap hook-ear headphones and decided it was time to spend a little extra for a higher quality pair. I tried this pair and I would not recommend. The sound quality is average at best...Standard Apple headphones are far superior. The most frustrating part of these headphones would be in the in-line microphone. Broken after 3 months usage. These are garbage. Plain and simple. Buy something nicer!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Love These Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. I love the sound. The buds stay in my ear. I like the microphone. The only drawback so far is that sometimes when I take them off, the buds slip off and stick in my ear. It's a bit odd feeling and I've almost lost one or two on occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Ajax19

customer_reviews.title: Not very good sound quality or noise reduction
customer_reviews.text: I bought these looking for a compact set of earphones for use on an aircraft, while taking much less space that my over-the-ear Audio Technica headphones. But their sound quality was not great, noise isolation inadequate. And they were not very comfortable. I suspect that the noise isolation and comfort problems are common to all in-ear earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Cyr

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for your $$$
customer_reviews.text: Both ear pieces fit perfectly and keep out the external noise. The bass is nice and full sounding. The high end is not piercing at higher volumes. The extras are what really make this deal so great. Besides listening to music it works great with my phone! I am very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MGC

customer_reviews.title: sound is fine. none of the fittings are perfect
customer_reviews.text: not impressed with the memory wire - doesn't hold. nobody can hear me very well. sound is fine. none of the fittings are perfect. when I add on the extension, the sound quality drops noticeably. I wanted these for running primarily, so works fine for that. also just wanted hands free headset to talk, doesn't work so well for that. can't just pop them on and go.
customer_reviews.author: dosdolfins

customer_reviews.title: Favorite headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite headphones by far! I accidentally left them in one of my shorts pockets and they kind've went through the washer. Luckily they are very durable and survived. They come with a large variety of rubber pieces so it will fit anyone's ears. The only thing i would change is that i wish there was a next button so i can skip a song without actually having to touch my ipod.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: I am still trying to get use to these. They don't have great sound quality but, then I didn't pay a lot. What can you expect. I use them at work. It is kind of noisy where I work and one job that I do doesn'y require talking to people and I can just put in my earphones and listen to music or podcasts or whatever. They work for that.
customer_reviews.author: TamaraC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping these earbuds would have worked because they were really comfortable around the ears. The sound was vert tinny sounding and they only way I could really hear the music was to push and hold the earbuds in my ears. Once I released them, I could hardly hear the music. I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: New Mexico Gal

customer_reviews.title: Suprised with quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: After cafeful research on good budget headphones, I chose these. They stay in place with no slipping and sound quality is amazing. I used them almost every day and considered upgrading when the new model was released. Still have to say these were a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, not sweat resistant, not good
customer_reviews.text: These headphone only lasted me 3 months. The volume control malfunctions whenever any sweat comes into contact (what's the point of "sports" headphones), the wiring deteriorated after only a few months of daily use at the gym; and the left earbud sound would go in and out every time I used them. There are much better sports headphones out there for less money. I would not recommend these to anyone and it was a waste of money. I notified MEElectronics about their malfunctioning product, and they would not even give me a refund. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: The ear-buds are nice for a while
customer_reviews.text: The ear-buds are nice for a while, but about two months after the one year warranty the wire covering plastic finally became work hardened and began to crack and expose the wire inside. The work hardening of the wires would also push them from the ear with head movement. Planned product obsolescence in action I guess. Wish more ear-buds had coil wire sections for better user head mobility during use.
customer_reviews.author: Thurmos121

customer_reviews.title: Used earphones for first time and the right side is stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Found these in my drawers and brand new in package. I used them last week and the right ear just stopped working suddenly. First staticky and then just went out. Since I bought in 2003, and just using them now, I can't return them or get a replacement. Should have tested them when I bought them as they were a back up pair.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: good headphones, sound quality, but only lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Headphones worked great, the chord length and extender are awesome, I use them a couple times a week while working out and have used them probably a total of 20-25 times. The right ear has quit working. Reasonably priced but know that you won't have them for long.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Kryta

customer_reviews.title: Just okay...
customer_reviews.text: The headphones sound pretty good for what was paid for them. One should definitely purchase these if having to dig the little rubber ear pieces out of your ear after using headphones is a source of enjoyment. The web site also stated that these are compatible with my Samsung Galaxy Note II but the microphone NEVER worked. I guess this is just another case of "You get what you pay for..."
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Quality control issues prevent my recommendation
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good for the price, thus I bought 2 separate pairs. My issue is the quality - in just over 1y of infrequent use, both sets have separated from the plug/cord interface. One set separated on the extender piece, the other on the headphone near the plug. The extender failure was especially annoying, as the extender was only used approximately ten times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality but not built well for sports
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was great and I quite like how they fit. However, I've been wearing them for nine months and they are shorting out so bad that they are useless. The y-connection where the volume control meets they earphone lines is not built well--sometimes I can hold them just right so that it connects. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Donahoe

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfactory barely covers it
customer_reviews.text: It was totally unsatisfactory, and I'm about to return it. As illustrated, it appears that there is a steady loop that can be adjusted to fit one's need. However, the wire mechanism is so flexible that it doesn't hold any shape and takes inordinately long to "fit" it EACH TIME I use it.l
customer_reviews.author: Martin Flahive

product_meta.title: MEE audio Sport-Fi S6P Memory Wire In-Ear Headphones with Microphone, Remote, Volume Control, and Sports Armband (Green/Black)
product_meta.description: Color:Green| Style:WiredThe MEE audio (formerly MEElectronics) Sport-Fi S6P is the complete workout package, providing a secure, comfortable, noise-isolating fit while delivering clear and dynamic sound with headset functionality.
feature_bullets: Secure over-the-ear fit with memory wire never falls out
Noise isolating in-ear design with energetic sound and enhanced bass
Inline microphone, remote, and universal volume control for headset use
Certified IPX5 sweat- and water-resistant for increased durability
Includes sports armband, modular cable, zipper carrying case, and 6 sets of ear tips; 1-Year manufacturer’s warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars827 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
